text: i see.  i have a somewhat similar story with my mom, but she didn't grow distant.  instead, when i was second grade(?) she started teaching again, so that got iin the way of playing with her.  a real shame, too, because she was really good a platformers.  my sister and i are planning to reintroduce gaming to her though, via megaman2.  i hope that you're on better terms with your dad.
